name: part_002
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】First Starring Role【轟はじめ⧸ReGLOSS】 #轟はじめ生誕祭2025 [bjPYXtxhm0I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Offside' by Hajime Todoroki with backup dancers.
MC section. Hajime catches her breath, greets the audience, and discusses the performance.
Performance of the song 'Deal with the devil'.

subtitles.original: ハッピーエンドのチャイムが
subtitles.english: When the chime of a happy ending

subtitles.original: 想像通りじゃないなら
subtitles.english: isn't quite what you imagined,

subtitles.original: 塗り替えてしまうのさ
subtitles.english: just paint over it.

subtitles.original: ゆらゆらゆらゆらどうぞ
subtitles.english: Swaying, swaying, swaying, come on.

subtitles.original: 敗北感とは
subtitles.english: A sense of defeat isn't

subtitles.original: 分かち合うもんではないから
subtitles.english: something to be shared,

subtitles.original: 蹴飛ばし染め上げてごらん
subtitles.english: so kick it away and dye it your color.

subtitles.original: そんなもんさ
subtitles.english: That's just how it is.

subtitles.original: 正直こんなの
subtitles.english: To be honest,

subtitles.original: 意味あるのかって
subtitles.english: I wonder if there's any point to this,

subtitles.original: 考えたところで 堂々巡りで
subtitles.english: but thinking about it just goes in circles.

subtitles.original: あれも これも それも気になる
subtitles.english: That, this, and even that bother me.

subtitles.original: 気になる 気になる
subtitles.english: It bothers me, it bothers me.

subtitles.original: それぞれ描いた 正義が絡み合う
subtitles.english: The different justices we've envisioned intertwine.

subtitles.original: あぁ まだまだ 行けそうさ
subtitles.english: Ah, I can still keep going.

subtitles.english: When the chime of a happy ending

subtitles.original: 想像通りじゃないなら
subtitles.english: isn't quite what you imagined,

subtitles.english: just paint over it.

subtitles.english: Swaying, swaying, swaying, come on.

subtitles.english: A sense of defeat isn't

subtitles.english: something to be shared,

subtitles.original: 蹴飛ばし染め上げてごらん
subtitles.english: so kick it away and dye it your color.

subtitles.original: そんなもんさ
subtitles.english: That's just how it is.

subtitles.original: どこで何が起きるか分からない
subtitles.english: I don't know what will happen where.

subtitles.original: またやり直せるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can start over again.

subtitles.english: When the chime of a happy ending

subtitles.english: A sense of defeat isn't

subtitles.english: something to be shared,

subtitles.english: so kick it away and dye it your color.

subtitles.english: That's just how it is.

subtitles.original: はぁー、いやぁー、はぁ、
subtitles.english: Haa... Whew... Haa...

subtitles.original: 皆さーん、こんちくわー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, Kon-chikuwa!

subtitles.original: はじめの第一回生誕祭、来てくれてありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to Hajime's very first birthday celebration.

subtitles.original: #はしたご は、轟はじめ生誕祭2025です！
subtitles.english: #Hashitago is the Hajime Todoroki Birthday Festival 2025!

subtitles.original: たくさんポストしてくれて嬉しい！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy you're all posting so much!

subtitles.original: アニョー！トレンド入ってるー！
subtitles.english: Whoa! It's trending!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much! I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: 本日は、アニョー、すごい、
subtitles.english: Today, whoa, it's amazing.

subtitles.original: 色んなはじめをお届けするので、
subtitles.english: I'll be showing you many different sides of Hajime,

subtitles.original: ぜひポストしてくれると嬉しいれす。
subtitles.english: so I'd be glad if you keep posting.

subtitles.original: 先ほどは「神風」と「OFFSIDE」という曲を聞いていただきました。
subtitles.english: You just heard the songs 'Kamikaze' and 'OFFSIDE'.

subtitles.original: どうでしたかー？
subtitles.english: How was it?

subtitles.original: かっこよかったですかー？
subtitles.english: Was it cool?

subtitles.original: 「かっこよかったよー！」
subtitles.english: 'It was so cool!'

subtitles.original: ありがとありがと。ありがとねー。
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you. Thank you.

subtitles.original: はじめは曲もね、この振り付けもめちゃくちゃ大好きなので、
subtitles.english: Hajime loves these songs and the choreography so much,

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ披露できて嬉しいれす！
subtitles.english: that I'm thrilled to be able to perform them for you!

subtitles.original: この後もまだたくさんあるので、
subtitles.english: There's still a lot more to come,

subtitles.original: 一緒に楽しんでくださーい。
subtitles.english: so please enjoy it with me.

subtitles.original: 次は、今かっこよかったけど、
subtitles.english: Next up, that was cool, but

subtitles.original: セクシーパートれす！
subtitles.english: it's time for the sexy part!

subtitles.original: おおー！それでは、いきましょう。
subtitles.english: Ooh! All right then, let's go.

subtitles.original: One, two, one...
subtitles.english: One, two, one...

subtitles.original: Wow!
subtitles.english: Wow!

subtitles.original:
Deal with the devil
作詞・作曲：ryo (supercell)
subtitles.english:
Deal with the devil
Lyrics & Composition: ryo (supercell)

subtitles.original: Up down 世の常
subtitles.english: Up and down, it's the way of the world

subtitles.original: 崩した一丁あがりの勝負
subtitles.english: Breaking down, a match decided in one go

subtitles.original: 肝心なのはストロングなマイマインド
subtitles.english: What's vital is a strong mind of my own

subtitles.original: 出し抜いてさあ
subtitles.english: So, outsmart them

subtitles.original: 行きつく先は ヘブン or ヘル
subtitles.english: The destination is heaven or hell

subtitles.original: この世界のルール たった一つ
subtitles.english: There's only one rule in this world

subtitles.original: 勝者こそが正義
subtitles.english: The winner is justice

subtitles.original: 女は度胸
subtitles.english: A woman needs courage

subtitles.original: 焦らさせるのよ あいつを
subtitles.english: I'll make him impatient

subtitles.original: やれること何だってやるわ
subtitles.english: I'll do whatever it takes

subtitles.original: 私は賭け狂いのクイーン
subtitles.english: I am the gambling-obsessed queen

subtitles.original: 網膜に映る闇切って
subtitles.english: Cutting through the darkness reflected in my retinas

subtitles.original: 連勝 どう？
subtitles.english: Consecutive wins, how's that?

subtitles.original: デビルさぁ目を見透かして
subtitles.english: Devil, see through my eyes

subtitles.original: 私のものにする
subtitles.english: I'll make it all mine

subtitles.original: あなたの髪の一本まで全部
subtitles.english: Down to every single strand of your hair

subtitles.original: How many you die? I select.
subtitles.english: How many you die? I select.

subtitles.original: 震えてるわよ 坊や
subtitles.english: You're trembling, boy

subtitles.original: 降ろしはしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't let you fold

subtitles.original: デビルさぁ面倒温存じゃ
subtitles.english: Devil, if I just save face,

subtitles.original: たまらないわ スリル
subtitles.english: the thrill won't be enough

subtitles.original: 誰にも触らせない黒真珠
subtitles.english: Black pearl that I'll let no one touch

subtitles.original: How many you die? I select.
subtitles.english: How many you die? I select.

subtitles.original: さあ来な
subtitles.english: Now, come on
